CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked

u.a: talks with Examiner via room microphone
takes cookie; puts it back in the container
walks toward chair away from M
motions to M to join him
C has walked over to his chair
pulls his chair back to table to join M
<bef> C puts block on x@l instead
<aft> C gets cookie out of container and shows to M
<aft> C takes bite of cookie and laughs
<aft> C puts the empty container back
breaks a little piece off cracker
C tries to drink form pitcher
tries to pour from empty pitcher
pours own juice into M's cup
